website_summaries.verdict: The overall best styling hair dryer that delivers a good amount of versatility.
pros: Uses a standard hair dryer base
Has the same speeds and heat settings as other traditional options
Comes with high-quality styling attachments, including a flexible, long-toothed circular brush for use with wavy and curly hairstyles
cons: Lacks some power on the higher speed settings

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well on very thick hair white female.
customer_reviews.text: I finally wanted an upgrade for my wife from the $20 Walmart specials. I hit a home run with this product. Specific feedback: My wife is a white female with very, very thick brown hair that is shoulder length (I love her hair!).Typically it takes forever to dry. She is extremely picky about personal care products. She loves this dryer. Faster and more gentle on her hair even after prolonged drying. The water infusion technology works for her. I am trying to provide meaningful info instead of general blah blah.
customer_reviews.author: Keko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the beauty industry, so I've tried every hair dryer that is supposed to be the latest and greatest... And never did I think this Panasonic would be superior, but (to my delight) it is! The dryer smooths frizzy hair like no other... especially when followed with a blast of the cool shot. I have spent hundreds more on dryer's, but this Panasonic out performs them all... leaving the hair super shiny and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Best hair dryer I have EVER owned!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, THE best blow dryer I have ever owned. I was a bit cautious considering some reviews that called it top heavy, but it's not heavy or awkward at all. It's quiet, dries hair pretty quickly, and it's amazing how soft my hair feels after I blow dry it. Every other blow dryer I've ever used has made my hair feel dry and brittle, but this one makes it feel soft and healthy. I would buy this product 100x over.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted by this product because of lots of good reviews and the technology it mentioned. I have been using it for months before write this review so I think I can conclude that it's NO better than the $20 cheap normal hair dryer from CVS. They do the same job, my hair doesn't get smooth or shiny from switching to this one. Actually my hair got quite dry if I chose the highest temperature and power level. Price-wise, the Panasonic EH-NA65-K is 5 fold higher. It's also bulky and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can’t belevie it!! It BURNED my hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t belevie it!! It BURNED my hair!!! I’ve been using a cheap hair drier for years and my hair was just fine. This fancy much more expensive one burned my hair and melted my brush! How hot is this thing??? Now my brush is gone, my newly styled hair is ruined. I litetrally need spend another $100 to have my hair redone (hopefully it could be redone)!!! I think my skulp is burned as well. I need an explanation!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Curly girl approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair, and I upgraded my hair dryer because I felt the one I’d been using wasn’t drying my hair quickly and it created extra frizz. I do the curly girl method on my hair and this dryer definitely dries faster, I believe it creates less frizz, and it seems to promote my curl. My curls are bouncier and more held together using this dryer. Also, I exclusively use the diffuser attachment which is nice and big and doesn’t fall off. Holds securely to the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Barbaro-Flores

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I have a T3 and i decide to purchase this because my T3 got old and had big hopes that it will be everything mention in description but it is absolutely opposite. This was one of the worst blow dryers i have ever used 1.So heavy you want to give up blowdrying your hair in the middle of the job. 2 keeps hair very freeze 3. Doesn't dry quick Not recommended at all. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I liked it fine until it made a pop and stopped working. I’ve had it for about 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: So far my Wife is impressed
customer_reviews.text: So far my Wife is impressed, looks like for her type of hair is just perfect and she is just trilled. This hairdryer seems to have new technology and good differentiation from others, It was an amazing gift so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jumoon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is the best hair dryer I've ever owned. This little gem is compact and convenient size for travel or storage. Actually, this is the quietest dryer I've ever owned. The Nanoe Technology really does work on my color damaged, dry, fine hair. My hair used to frizz badly after blowdrying but now it's sleek and smooth. I couldn't be more impressed and happy.
customer_reviews.author: bingjie

customer_reviews.title: Light and not too noisy
customer_reviews.text: People gave a lot of compliment of this product. So, I wanted to give it a try. It's not heavy and easy to hold on to it. When using it for a while, hand handle isn't too hot which is a plus. The one I had prior was from Costco and the hand held would be so hot after using for a longer time. This drying power isn't as strong as I expected, but works well as a dryer. It's also not too noisy which is good! Overall is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Life

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ONE!!! SHOULD TRY THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! THIS IS AN AMAZING!!! I used to use “manoe” in Japan.. Then I was looking for some good with my hair. (my hair got damaged from dyed) This really works for my hair. Smooth and Shiny turned beautiful hair!!!! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maki

customer_reviews.title: A great blower!
customer_reviews.text: This is Not the traveling size. So for her, it doesn’t travel. But... it is the perfect in-home dryer, powerful and quiet leaving my wife’s hair with fantastic texture and body. It dries speedily leaving the pleasant scents of your hair product unlike other iterations from the PRC. Finishes & build quality are fantastic. Blower is powerful for quickies, and cool settings for not over heating your puppy’s mane after she rolls in......
customer_reviews.author: Chucklosvok

customer_reviews.title: A worthy upgrade from my $20 dollar dryer
customer_reviews.text: I was using an entry level dryer before getting this one. The difference is quite apparent from the first use itself. The air flow is well focused unlike other one. Somehow the smell of heated air is also very minimal. The attachment is sturdy. Color is pretty decent and does not look cheap. And yes, the chord is decent long!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Who

customer_reviews.title: Make your hair smoother
customer_reviews.text: It does make your hair smoother than other hair dryer, and it’s easy to use. The only downside is it’s not light. But it’s okay for me since my old Conair hair dryer is almost as heavy as this one, so I kind of get used to it. I am thinking to buy a compact one for traveling too.
customer_reviews.author: Yifan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it's exactly what I needed for my long curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nova Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Can't Ask for More
customer_reviews.text: I was born with super thick semi-wavy hair, and each time at the hairdresser, they would have to layer [cut] my hair like crazy so I don't look like I have a huge head. Simply put, I desire my hair to look healthy and be as straight as possible without the huge cost in paying for a Japanese blowout or other expensive treatments. In the past, I have had three $120+ hair dryers, and everyone of them have served me at least 5+ years and I loved them. For this less than $80 price tag, it does almost as great a job as the others I have had. I can't ask for more. ^^
customer_reviews.author: ProjectLight

customer_reviews.title: Keep your head far, or it will stack your hair
customer_reviews.text: It dries quick and more quiet than the one I had before. But this stacks my hair every time! The head will stack the hair and hard to take my hair out. So, keep it far away from your head when using, everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: LEHAO DENG

customer_reviews.title: Not made in China - yay!  Doesn't dry hair well - boo!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a hair dryer not made in China and thought this would be perfect, but the nozzle is too wide to dry hair effectively. Without any attachments it blows hair around, but doesn't concentrate the air flow to dry hair quickly or nicely. The "concentrator" nozzle attachment is too tall in the middle to be effective. The "quick dry" attachment also was too large to dry hair quickly. The diffuser attachment didn't really diffuse either. I was really disappointed with this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: JJP

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, low noise level, and not over-dry your hair
customer_reviews.text: The Nanoe technique does work! I feel much better hair condition after use it than other dryer. The noise level is lower than my old dryer, and air flow is much more strong! A happy purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: Personally I think the nanoe is a gimmick but apparently dryer as a whole works well and does not make the hair too frizzy. I think it's just because it does not blow as hard as the one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.text: The second one I bought, the first one was given to my mum since she wanted it after trying once. My hair is soft, this hair dryer helps to keep stylish and healthy-looking. I think it’s as good as the expensive Dyson product, and it’s much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: yixuan619

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I used this hair dryer this morning for the first time. I used the attachment for blowing out my hair straight. I have wavy/curly hair and usually I have to blow it out then use a flat iron. Not today! I used the same round brush with the same hair products and my hair was flat. I didn't need the flat iron. I've never had a dryer work this well. Plus it wasn't that loud either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: after I compared it with T3 lightweight, I decided to keep this one. It can make your hair less frizzy but also volume at the same time, when you touch your hair you feel strenth and smooth at the same time, really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jingwen Liu

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife. The high power function stopped working after a couple months unless we push hard at a weird angle. Even then it only works sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Works okay
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer dries quickly. Have thick curly shoulder length hair. Did not make hair shiny. Not as heavy or big as my 8 yr old hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: D. L.

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer with reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This dryer did dry my hair faster than other cheap dryer I have. It is not too heavy but there is a plastic smell from the air blow out. It doesn’t bother me that much. I like this dryer so far.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Winner, winner
customer_reviews.text: This dryer works great although it is a bit large and can be awkward to use at times. It's not as noisy as most other dryers which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: The AngelArs Foundation

customer_reviews.title: Worth purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Super good! I like this dryer so much! Not that light but of high quality! I have choice of hot warm and cool and the level of the air coming out, which is perfect! And the hair feels pretty smooth compared with the past when I used regular hairdryer
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Worth the extra money. I have fine hair that is prone to static, which is often made worse because I live in a dry windy climate. This hair dryer really seems to help. My hair is smoother and softer.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much! It better than all I have before. after use it the hair doesn’t dry and frizzy at all. 3 different models for choose, but I only use this one daily.
customer_reviews.author: Anifa

customer_reviews.title: Wife's favorite now
customer_reviews.text: Wife had trouble with all those cheap dryers but now she loves this one. Drys fast and not feeling so damage to the hair
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Zhang

customer_reviews.title: seem like something fall apart in this machine......never experienced such problem ...
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 4 months...I use it less than one time per week and just now when I was using it, it suddenly had a crack sound and then got some smoke and stopped working......I could hear the sound of loose part inside, seem like something fall apart in this machine......never experienced such problem in cheaper ones...
customer_reviews.author: Yifan D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing effect
customer_reviews.text: Initially I did not put much hope, but the outcome really surprise me!! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a year
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I expect this dryer to work for 2-3 years. and it did not last for a year. SAD. have to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Lin,mengna

customer_reviews.title: my hair is shiny!!
customer_reviews.text: after drying my hair with this drier, it was much shinier and smoother than when using my other hair dryer!!
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Gigantic and heavy with little power
customer_reviews.text: My old Chi dryer finally died so I bought this thinking that it was going to dry my hair quickly and leave it looking smooth. Well first of all, it’s GIGANTIC and then you turn it on and think it’s going to blow dry your hair so fast but it barely has any blowing power. I returned it for a Babybliss that I am very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Malexe

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blow dryer for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this blow dryer. I didn’t want to spend a lot on a hair dryer and I think you get a powerful blow dryer for the money. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Granich

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Satisfied with Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a better experience in blow drying instead of using those “boring” dryers sold at Walmart, Target and etc. This is the one for you! Reasonable price, strong drying power, Good looking, wonderful touching feeling. My BF just love it!
customer_reviews.author: SisiDidiXixi

customer_reviews.title: Nice and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Nice hair dryer. Only used at home. No traveling with it yet. Only down fall is they put the controls right where you hold it and sometimes I hit it off. But great other wise.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and heavy hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: The power is really strong. The size is not suitable for travel, and the weight is heavy too. Only recommend to use it at home. And the only complaint It's the switch on handle. It's easily to move when you are using it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Better than a dyson
customer_reviews.text: My wife says it’s perfect, better than the dyson and a quarter of the costs. It’s comes with all the attachments and you still get a great name brand!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Padial

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Workout and have hair extensions on,this dryer is great,on med heat for 5mins my hair/extensions is dry and is not noisy like some dryer great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Roseline isoken osagie

customer_reviews.title: We don't know for how long it will last yet, but in general it's good product
customer_reviews.text: We just bought it few months ago, drying power is not that strong, but in general pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: strong plastic smelling
customer_reviews.text: strong plastic smelling, especially the biggest Nozzle, even just put that biggest nozzle on table , the smelling come to me . panasonic shouldn't be this quality .
customer_reviews.author: Donotbuy

customer_reviews.title: Good design - dries well - minimum hair damage
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than you might expect for the size - good design. Does an excellent job of drying without damaging hair.
customer_reviews.author: Bama Fan 2009

customer_reviews.title: very good hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I used to use very cheap ones ($20). This is much much better. Hair is so smooth after using this one. It dries hair very fast. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dryer, i don’t need hair oil anymore! Buy it! It’s more value than dyson
customer_reviews.author: penny lee

customer_reviews.title: Love the dryer but....
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer!!! It makes my hair looks voluminous and soft!!!! I don’t think the dryer is easy to travel with coz it’s quite big and bulky and heavy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cuts down on the frizz!
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I've tried several ceramic, ionic dryers in the past few years and I saw absolutely no difference in how my fine ," prone to frizz in humidity" hair came out after blowing it dry. With my new Panasonic, my hair looks smoother, less frizzy and stays that way during the day. For me, this is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Rudy's mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. It works great. Dry fast and light weight. My hair feels soft after dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kaptain Davy

customer_reviews.title: Weak and hotel-cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: The air blow on high is super weak and because of that, it is hard to style my hair on a round brush. I could not feel the difference in my hair softness. It is like a cheap hotel hair dryer. It is not worth the money and it is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Halina

customer_reviews.title: Drying power with less frizz
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth the extra fee dollars to get this hair dryer. I have thick and frizzy hair and wow this hair dryer reduces the drying time to half and my hair is no longer get frizzy ! Get it you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.author: LittleMe

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous and slow dryer
customer_reviews.text: The power is not strong enough. It took me 5 minutes to dry. Also, the high heat is dangerous and easy to absorb your hair into the machine. use with caution and definitely don't let the head closely touch your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Elllllla

customer_reviews.title: Personally love it
customer_reviews.text: Just replace it for the old one!fast ,strong and hot!
customer_reviews.author: visnon li

customer_reviews.title: Good for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: It makes my hair so soft and dripping down! If you have thick and coarse hair please try this
customer_reviews.author: aliengirl

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure about the nanoe but it is slow for my hair to dry...
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My hair feel so soft .Love it so much.No noise.Dry fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Durable and solid
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for more than 3 years. It still functioning as new. Very powerful fan speed
customer_reviews.author: Jun Mai

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I guess this hair dryer is good, though I don't have many other comparisons. But it's really heavy, I can feel the weight when holding it for 10 seconds. Just beware of the heavy weight, otherwise it's a quick/quiet hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: gogomustangs

customer_reviews.title: Great Dyer and worthy buying
customer_reviews.text: It saved me a lot of time to blow dry my hair from wet to dry!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Chen

customer_reviews.title: Strange smell
customer_reviews.text: It drys the hair really quickly. However, it has strange smell especially when it is on. I blowed my hair two minutes and this strange smell was full of my whole room. I already used it for five time, it still had strong smell!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Produc!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! It stopped working properly after 6 months and I am unable to get a hold of Panisonic for a warranty claim,l.
customer_reviews.author: gabriela oceguera

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I invested in this blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I live my new blow dryer. My sister liked it so much when she visited me, that she ordered one just like it. It does have a long cord. We think it makes our hair more full looking.
customer_reviews.author: M. Camomile

customer_reviews.title: Better than our Chi
customer_reviews.text: Wife says it works a lot better than her expensive Chi that just died after 2 years. She doesn’t use any of the attachments that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heyheyhey

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t get very hot
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good dryer . It doesn’t heat your sacão.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I think the Nanoe actually works
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my gf and she loves it. The Nanoe technology really does seem to work. Hair seems fuller or thicker and shiny when I use this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product can dry my hairs fast. My hairs not only dry fast but also not frizzy. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: You will feel the hair smoother after the first use. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Wood

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I owned another $200 model before, which broke in a year. To me, this model works equally well. The only downside is the size. However, the price difference makes the decision a no brainier.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Good hair dryer and not expensive
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little time to dry my hair. And my hair are smooth after using it for a few days. It is not heavy by comparing my old one. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: SHI Xiaoyu

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Not too loud, dries my hair fast enough, a bit heavy to hold it but that’s the only down side of it. I’m happy with this hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Elina

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Super nice ! It make my hair feel more healthy

customer_reviews.title: Little bit sad
customer_reviews.text: juse bought in 4 month then burn out! It's nice dryer , but ...... i don't know how to go though thr warranty
customer_reviews.author: Zaiheng

customer_reviews.title: My hair is glowing!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer cut the drying time in half and really silkened my hair. It’s not collapsible so won’t fit well in a suitcase. Put that aside, it’s a great hairdryer that’s lightweight and easy to control
customer_reviews.author: Sanghun Bae

customer_reviews.title: Magic wand, it's real.
customer_reviews.text: This is a magic wand, nanoe! Definitely worth the money. Only for long hair, don't buy it if you have short hair, no magic for short hair.
customer_reviews.author: rickyzgz

customer_reviews.title: Frizzy free hair
customer_reviews.text: Best hair dryer that won’t leave you hair frizzy after blow drying! Bought a second one for my moms place! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shandra

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: always make good stuff, I love this brand. After I used this dyer, I feel it good for my hair. Not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: mingyue wang

customer_reviews.title: High cost performance
customer_reviews.text: High quality and great performance. This is suitable for home use, and may not suitable when you are out.
customer_reviews.author: Hakubun

customer_reviews.title: A good hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it has three temperature that you can choose and how powerful you want with each temperature. It just a little heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie c.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It does not dry very fast, but my hair feels better than my old random-brand drier. It looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kc1st

customer_reviews.title: Dry hair fast
customer_reviews.text: Dry hair fast, temperature is appropriate. Size is a little big.

customer_reviews.title: Broke within one year of use
customer_reviews.text: The air stream has not been strong since purchase, and the item is broken within one year of use.

customer_reviews.title: Grad to chose this one!
customer_reviews.text: HIgh power but quiet and be able to keep hair moisture.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this product again :-)
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Have very long thick hair. Cut drying time almost in half. Did not frizz my hair as other dryers have in the past.

customer_reviews.title: Price dropped after I bought, so sad
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer works well. However, after I bought it 2 weeks, the price dropped a lot. So sad
customer_reviews.author: Daisy A.

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: It dries thick hair very fast. It usually takes 40 min for me to get hair dry. I only need less than 10 min now. Great purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy blowdryer
customer_reviews.text: Great blowdryer. Dries hair quickly. Long extension cord. Well constructed. It is a little heavier than other driers.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer. It was not cheap, but it does do what it claims to do. Even my hairdresser noticed that my hair was much healthier.

customer_reviews.title: Dries hair quickly
customer_reviews.text: It dries my hair in no time. I have thick coarse hair. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: heavy but useful
customer_reviews.text: it can dry my hair quickly but it is too large and heavy. It is a great weight to hang up!

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer that drys quickly
customer_reviews.text: Drys quick and well, what else do I need to say :)
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I highly recommend to long hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have very long hair. This Panasonic works really well and can dry my long hair in 1 minute ! I love it and highly recommend to long hair girls!
customer_reviews.author: Ling

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful appearance
customer_reviews.text: The electric wind has been blowing for a long time. It's very good. There are three adjusting buttons. After blowing, the hair is very soft.

customer_reviews.title: it is good
customer_reviews.text: Hair will be more smooth after being dried with this hair dryer. It is almost perfect, but the power is not that good.

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: this is wonderful one but might be a little bigger for traveling

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: Don’t see additional smoothing effect, but I am happy with it not overheating

customer_reviews.title: Drying fast!
customer_reviews.text: It is drying the hair fast, and it keeps my hair smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Min Hong

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product was just what I needed. No need to use it on high, the low setting works perfectly fine. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hampton

product_meta.title: Panasonic EH-NA65-K nanoe Dryer, Professional-Quality with 3 attachments Including Quick Blow Dry Nozzle for Smooth, Shiny Hair, Pink
product_meta.description: The powerful Panasonic nanoe EH-NA65-K Moisture Infusion Hair Dryer with advanced nanoe ionic hair dryer technology makes it quick and easy to blow dry and style hair. Unlike other ionic hair dryers and blow dryers, the 1875-Watt nanoe Panasonic hair dryer draws naturally occurring moisture from the air and transforms it into micro-size particles containing 1,000 times more moisture than regular ionic hair dryers. As you blow dry and style, the micro nanoe moisture particles are infused into each hair shaft to minimize frizz while strengthen and shielding hair from over-drying and damage often caused by everyday brushing after using a typical blow dryer. The result is smooth, shiny, beautiful-looking hair. The EH-NA65 Panasonic nanoe Hair Dryer features two hair dryer professional speeds — high and low — and three temperature settings — hot, warm and cool — to accommodate different hair styles and types. This Panasonic hair dryer also includes three professional quality nanoe hair dryer - attachments for styling and touchups. The Panasonic nanoe Quick-Dry Nozzle delivers both soft and strong airflows designed for faster, more even drying. A Concentrator Nozzle focuses nanoe hair dryer airflow for targeted, precision styling and a Diffuser creates body and volume. The Panasonic nanoe hair dryer also features a cool-shot button, heavy-duty hair dryer professional 9-ft., 360° rotating power cord with a hanging loop and a removable, easy-to-clean filter.
feature_bullets: Salon quality results: Panasonic nanoe hair dryer is shown to reduce damage caused everyday brushing and enhance hair's smoothness and shine

Patented nanoe technology: Panasonic nanoe technology draws moisture from the air to gently infuse nanoe particles, which hold 1000x more moisture than regular ions, into every shaft of hair so you can dry hair without drying it out

Three pro quality attachments: Style while you dry with three pro quality attachments: Dual airflow quick dry nozzle helps dry hair faster; Concentrator nozzle provides focused airflow for precise styling; Full sized diffuser adds volume while combating frizz
Two speed, three temperature settings: Provides 2 speeds and 3 temperature settings for different styles and drying times, plus hot, warm and cool settings for different hair types
Professional features: This powerful yet quiet 1875 watt blow dryer also features a cool shot button, easy clean filter and 9 foot rotating power cord with convenient hanging loop

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
